price: (75) [The angels will say], "That was because you used to exult upon the earth without right and you used to behave insolently.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَفۡرَحُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَمۡرَحُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: dhālikum bimā kuntum tafraḥūna fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi wabimā kuntum tamraḥūna
